name: Vidcaster
description: Vidcaster is a video training platform used by companies like Wix, VMware, and MIT to drive measurable training outcomes for employees, prospects, customers and distributed workforces. The platform includes a suite of tools for video hosting, user authentication, in-video engagement, and analytics data that integrates into third-party systems.
